name: emi.apel
description: APEL (Accounting Processor for Event Logs) is a tool that gathers CPU accounting information by parsing batch system and blah accounting log files and inserts it into a local MySQL database. APEL then publishes the data into a centralised repository.
releaseNotes: APEL has been completely rewritten in python. These parsers (2.1.0) are compatible only with APEL Publisher 4.1.0 and above.
changeLog:
support for SLURM

        APEL has been completely rewritten in python. These parsers (2.1.0) are compatible only with APEL Publisher 4.1.0 and above.

        The documentation has also been completely rewritten.
